## Description {#details}

Helps unique <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieabbrev">DIEAbbrev</a> objects and assigns abbreviation numbers.

This class will unique the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> abbreviations for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">llvm::DIE</a> object and assign a unique abbreviation number to each unique <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieabbrev">DIEAbbrev</a> object it finds. The resulting collection of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieabbrev">DIEAbbrev</a> objects can then be emitted into the .debug&#95;abbrev section.

Definition at line 140 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
